<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_1434439_my_tem_0.sendEmergencyAlertFormSecondaryValues</api_name><description/><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>sendEmergencyAlertFormSecondaryValues</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var loggedINUser = gs.getUserDisplayName();
	var created = new Date();
	var output = [{"fieldName":"Author","fieldLabel":"Author","displayValue":loggedINUser,"highlightedValueStyle":null},{"fieldName":"Created","fieldLabel":"Created","displayValue":created,"highlightedValueStyle":null,"referenceItem":null,"type":"simple"}];
	return JSON.stringify(output);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>1f32a25c012202108b31036fec768cbc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sendEmergencyAlertFormSecondaryValues</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_1f32a25c012202108b31036fec768cbc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:46</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>
